body.p: Mibble is an open-source SNMP MIB (or SMI) parser library for Java. It reads MIB files (in ASN.1 syntax) and provides an API to access all the information, including OIDs, types, descriptions, comments and the original MIB source text.
Mibble comes bundled with a comprehensive set standard IANA and IETF MIBs, command-line apps for formatting and validation, and a graphical MIB browser with a simple SNMP manager.
See the Mibble web site or the Github project page for the latest version or updates.
The documents below are the release notes for Mibble version ():

item.text: Instructions for installing and running Mibble.
List of features supported in this version.
